academic_year: Applicable for all current admission cycles

overview.short_intro: Brainware Krira Ratna is a prestigious sports scholarship designed to reward students who have represented and excelled in sports at district, state, national, or international levels. The scholarship provides substantial tuition fee waivers based on the level of sports achievement.
objective: Encourage excellence in sports alongside academics
Promote sports culture within the university
Recognize competitive achievements at various levels

scholarship_benefits.important_note: Tuition fee waiver applies only after verification of valid sports documents.

academic_requirement: Candidate must have secured minimum 60% throughout their academic career
sports_requirement: Must possess valid medal / trophy / certificate
Sports achievement must be at District / State / National / International level

document_requirements.verification_policy: Documents must be submitted and verified every semester

general_rules: A candidate can opt for only ONE Brainware University scholarship scheme
Students availing Full or Half Freeship are NOT eligible for Early Bird Offer
Scholarship continuation depends on document re-verification every semester
rules_and_conditions.exclusivity_clause: Brainware Krira Ratna cannot be combined with other Brainware scholarships.
